actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that any attempt at health care reform should ensure that patients have the right to choose their health care providers.

summary.text: Expresses Congress's commitment to uphold a patient's right to choose his or her health care provider. Recognizes that patient choice results in higher quality of care, lower costs, and more effective treatment outcomes.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that any attempt at health care reform should ensure that patients have the right to choose their health care providers.
